info.name: DSG Schema design AB_AC
info.description: This collection contains objects to create DSG Brand Datatypes, Abandon Cart field group, Abandon Browse field group.

body.raw:
{   
       "type": "object",
        "title": "cartItems",
                                    "description": "CartItems for Abandon Cart and Abandon Browse",
                                    "properties": {
                                        "product3": {
                                            "title": "product3",
                                            "description": "",

                                            "required": [],

                                            },
                                        "product4": {

                                            "description": "",

                                            },

                                            "description": "",

                                            },

                                            "description": "",

}
